@description: English translation for the file management module
@module_description: This module is intended for online file management for platform users.
files.allow_public_files#desc: Allow user to publish public files accessible by everyone
files.allow_private_files#desc: Allow the user to manage private files, visible only to him
files.list_public_files#desc: Allow user to view list of public files
files.quota#desc: Maximum size in bytes authorized for each user for his files (put 0 not to limit)
files.bypass_quota#desc: Allow user to exceed storage quota
files.use_trash#desc: Allow the user to put his files in the trash after deletion (if disabled the files will be directly deleted without possible recovery)
files.use_shortlinks#desc: Allow the user to generate a short link when sharing a file in public (if the "shortlink" module is active)
files.images_preview#desc: Generate thumbnail for supported image files
private_files_disallowed: You do not have the right to manage private files
file_not_saved: The file was not saved. Do you want to save it?
quota_exceeded: This operation makes you exceed the authorized storage quota! Try deleting files to free up space.
cannot_move_temp: Unable to move temporary file, please try again
file_too_large: The file exceeds the maximum size allowed for sending files
cannot_copy_dir_in_itself: You cannot copy a directory inside itself
name: Name
confirm_trash: Do you want to move this file/folder to the trash?
confirm_delete: Do you want to permanently delete this file/folder?
cannot_trash: Unable to move file/folder to trash
trash_disallowed: You do not have the right to use the recycle bin
confirm_restore: Do you want to restore this file/folder?
cannot_read_trash_meta: Unable to get deleted file information
confirm_empty_trash: Do you want to empty the trash? All files will be permanently deleted
empty_trash_error: Unable to completely empty the trash
public_files_disallowed: You do not have the right to manage public files
share_explain: By sharing this file, it will become accessible to anyone with its link. You can stop sharing it at any time. If you delete the file, the public link will no longer be accessible.
confirm_delete_share: If you stop sharing this file, it will no longer be accessible via its public link. The file will not be deleted from your storage space. Do you want to delete the share?
share_deleted: The file is no longer shared
public_list_disallowed: You do not have permission to list your public files
